text: Back in Trouble is a 1997 Luxembourgian German action comedy movie directed by Andy Bausch and is the sequel to the 1988 movie Troublemaker. It stars Thierry van Werveke, Ender Frings, Oscar Ortega Sánchez, Nicole Max, Dietmar Schönherr, Sascha Ley, Fatih Akin. ==Other websites== * Category:1997 action movies Category:1997 comedy movies Category:1990s sequel movies Category:Luxembourgian action movies Category:Luxembourgian comedy movies Category:German action movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Andy Bausch
title: Back in Trouble
